participant_1.background:
My parents immigrated from europe before i was born.
I drive a motorcycle instead of a car.
While both my parents have thick european accents , i do not.
I am enrolled in several college credit courses.
I go to a private high school.

participant_2.background:
I do not like vegetables.
My favorite truck is a chevy drama.
My favorite store is american eagle.
I love to go running.

content.text: I like to go running, too! Where do you like to run?
I usually run around my neighborhood, but I'm also a big fan of running in parks.
I love running in parks! There's something so peaceful about it.
I know, right? It's the best way to relax and clear your head.
I agree. So, what's your favorite park to run in?
I love running in Central Park. It's so big and there's always something to see.
I've never been to Central Park, but I've heard great things about it.
You should definitely go! It's one of the best parks in the world.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. So, what's your favorite thing about running?
I love the feeling of being free and the way it clears my head.
I know, right? It's the best way to relax and de-stress.
I agree. I also love the way it makes me feel physically.
Me too! It's a great way to get in shape.
Definitely. So, what's your favorite thing to do when you're not running?
I love to read, watch movies, and spend time with my friends and family.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I'm especially a fan of fantasy and science fiction.
Me too! I love the way they can transport me to another world.
I know, right? They're the best.
So, what do you like to do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in programming.
It's a lot of fun! But it can also be challenging.
I can imagine. So, what are some of your favorite things about your job?
I love the problem solving aspect of it. It's really satisfying to come up with a solution to a complex problem.
I can imagine. And what are some of your least favorite things about your job?
I can't think of anything specific. I love my job!
That's great! I'm glad you like it.
